version_description:
- Artifacts - new powerful items organized into sets
- Collectible puzzle pieces - artifact parts
- Earn souls (new currency) playing in the survival tower
- PvP matchmaking improvements
- A number of small fixes

- Artifacts - new powerful items organized into sets
- Collectible puzzle pieces - artifact parts
- Earn souls (new currency) playing in the survival tower
- PvP matchmaking improvements
- A number of small fixes

What's new:
- PvP mode got a new league system
- You can now enter Survival Tower for free every 12h
- You can now enter Survival Tower for gold
- Other minor updates and bug fixes

- Other minor updates and bug fixes

- Dragon Scale set skills are now more powerful

What's new?
- Clan system - creating and joining clans is now possible
- Clan upgrades for all clan members
- Real time PvP between clan members (beta feature)
- Clan chat
